Arizona Winter School 2015: Arithmetic and Higher-Dimensional Varieties

AWS 2015 was held March 14-18, 2015 at the University of Arizona in Tucson, AZ.

  • Schedule and other important information
  • Local directions
  • Organizers: Rachel Pries and Matthew Papanikolas (main program), with Bryden Cais, Mirela Ciperiani, and Romyar Sharifi.
